org.forgerock.cuppa.functions

Interface HookFunction

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface HookFunction
    Implement this interface to define a test hook. Hooks are used to setup and teardown state for tests.

    This is a functional interface whose functional method is apply().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply()
      Defines the behaviour of a test hook.
      static HookFunction identity()
      Returns a function that does nothing.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        void apply()
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Defines the behaviour of a test hook.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - To allow tests and hooks to throw checked exceptions.

      • identity

        static HookFunction identity()
        Returns a function that does nothing.
        Returns:
        a function that does nothing
